name: HORK
description:
HORK is a solo project, not just a solo project but the first ever game made by myself, even though it's a simple game I hold it really close to my hearth, a passion project, this was the first time in my life that I knew what I desired to do. Make games.

---------------------------------HOW TO PLAY---------------------------------

WASD - Move

ESC - Pause

The objective is simple, score the highest, for that, you will need to fight through waves of enemies and choose between four weapons:

P - Pistol

S - Shotgun

L - Laser

SMG - Sub-machine Gun

In the beginning you can chose to keep your pistol or pick another weapon, whenever pick another weapon that you already have you'll gain another level on that weapon, shooting stronger bullets, but, whenever you get hit, besides losing a life (top-left-corner) you also lose speed and a level on your current weapon.

The rest is up to you to find out!

Have fun!
